title: Podcast 340: Breaking Free From Codependency
description:
EPISODE DESCRIPTION: In this podcast I talk about the difference between codependency and being codependent. In my previous podcast on relationships (ep 255), I talked about how to handle changing relationships, or how there may be moments when you must end a relationship and just walk away. For this podcast, I want to talk about a big concept that many people have heard of, but can be one of the hardest things to recognize in ourselves and others: codependency.

Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/codependency


Get my new book Cleaning up Your Mental Mess here: https://www.cleaningupyourmentalmess.com

Download my new and improved brain detox app here: https://neurocycle.app

Sign up to join my free text program and receive mental health care tips. Just text DRLEAF to 1 (833) 285 3747

Get a free Cleaning up Your Mental Mess workbook when you subscribe to my weekly email at drleaf.com!


OFFERS FROM OUR SPONSORS:

-Huzzah: Get your cooler ready and stock up on HUZZAH Probiotic Seltzer by using code DRLEAF for up to 20% off your order at drinkhuzzah.com

-LMNT: For a limited time, you can claim a free LMNT Sample Pack! Each sample pack includes 7 packets of LMNT (1 of every flavor), and the offer is limited to one time per customer. For more information and to claim your free offer visit: http://drinklmnt.com/Leaf

-NOOM: For your special offer see: noom.com/DRLEAF


PODCAST HIGHLIGHTS:

1:30 The difference between codependent behavior & codependency

2:00 What is codependency?

3:00 The difference between the giver & the taker in codependent relationships

8:10, 16:00, 22:10 The main signs & signals of codependency

10:30, 14:00 How to use mind management to recognize & work on codependency

11:00 The importance of the WHAT & the WHY

23:40 Boundaries & codependency

26:00 The difference between supporting & fixing others

26:30 Self-esteem & codependency

37:00 Addiction, trauma & codependency
